## American football

```{r}
sport <- "american-football"
```

### Teams

```{r}
res <- addApiFootball(dir.name = "../data", sport = sport,  datatype = "teams", season = 2022, league = 1, api.key = "7183699be7198ae838421831d788e077")
```

### Games

```{r}
res <- addApiFootball(dir.name = "../data", sport = sport,  datatype = "games", season = 2023, league = 1, api.key = "7183699be7198ae838421831d788e077")
```

### Leagues

```{r}
res <- addApiFootball(dir.name = "../data", sport = sport,  datatype = "leagues", api.key = "7183699be7198ae838421831d788e077")
```

### Standings

```{r}
res <- addApiFootball(dir.name = "../data", sport = sport,  datatype = "standings", season = "2023", league = 1, api.key = "7183699be7198ae838421831d788e077")
```
